bike.description: Specialized Shiv Pro 10r carbon, FACT IS construction, crosswind-optimized airfoils, 1-1/8" lower bearing, OSBB, Control Tower Fit System, Fuelselage Integrated Hydration System

components.description: Specialized FACT Aero carbon monocoque, carbon steerer and crown for 1-1/8" bearing
1-1/8" upper and lower, stainless steel cartridge bearings
Magura RT6TT caliper hydraulic brakes including adaptors and brake pads
Nylon flat test ride, loose-ball, w/ reflectors
Specialized Turbo Elite, 100TPI, aramid bead, BlackBelt protection, 700x23c
Specialized Turbo Elite, 100TPI, aramid bead, BlackBelt protection, 700x23c
Body Geometry Sitero Expert, w/ SWAT Technology, tri-pod w/ bottle cage, hollow Ti rails
Integrated hydration and frame-mounted Fuelcell, Chainstay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owner's manual
